google.description: Enlisting as a group when one of them is drafted into the Vietnam War, best friends Morris, Rudi, Ivan and Beck pledge their loyalty to one another before reporting to different branches of service, where they are watched over by Morris, who has been experiencing haunting dreams.
google.title: I Pledge Allegiance
